duties_responsibilities.duty: Validate and create the Apprentice Program training curriculum in collaboration with the Help Desk and Engineering partners.
Support new training content development and collaborate with Help Desk and Engineering functions.
Assist in the development of program dashboard and real-time/on-demand reporting updates.
Involve in multiple workstreams and supporting projects throughout the lifecycle.
Build relationships with teams, vendors, and business unit project managers.
Act as a change agent by anticipating technology opportunities, proposing viable solutions, and enabling process/technical innovation.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Management, Economics, Finance, Accounting, or a relevant field is required.
